content.rendered:
In Kenya today, gambling has become quite popular. The number of betting sites in the country are on the rise and are only expected to rise further.

Jengacash

This one takes the first spot for obvious reasons. It has been in the operation for more than 5 years, holds the reputation of having high chance of winning and fast pay. From the reviews of casino lovers JengaCash has made cash for many players due to its straight forward way of making easy money. It is in the recent past that they have introduced big jackpot with very high probability of wining. We would advise our readers to try their luck since it offers the best chance to be a millionaire.

Betway Casino

This is one of the most popular online Casinos in Kenya. It has an android compatible app that allows you to download it sbd play it any time. It offers a wide range of games including scratchcards, Roulette, Keno, Baccarat and even video poker. A unique feature about this app is the fact that it offers a huge bonus of Ksh.1000.

Mansion Casino

This is another online casino in Kenya that is known for its insane bonuses. This casino was officially opened in 2004 and is found in more than 10 African countries.  It has more than 250 games which include online live dealer games. This company is famous for accepting different payment options such as Neteller, Skrill and also bank transfers.

Slotto Cash Casino

Some of the few factors that make this casino company stand out are their high bonuses and number of free spins. They offer a $ 7777 match bonus and 100 free spins.  Another aspect that makes them stand out is their huge progressive jackpots. Slotto Cash casino is a reliable casino company that has a round-the-clock support team that handles all customer concerns.

Spinit Casino

This is another online casino in Kenya that is known for a number of reasons. The main reason this casino is popular is the fact that they offer their new clients a huge number of spins. They offer up to 200 spins for new customers and other cash bonuses as well.

 Slots Heaven Casino

This casino has a number of interesting slot games such as Lucky Panda, Chinese Kitchen and Iron man 3. For those who enjoy live casino, blackjack and roulette, this is a site that is likely to meet your needs. This online casino company has an application software that is Android compatible and easy to download and use. There are a number of casino games offered on this platform and they include baccarat, scraps, and even casino poker.

Casino cruise

This is another gambling company in Kenya that is famous for its free spins and match bonuses. It offers up to 100 free spins for new customers and up to £ 1000 match bonus. It is a Malta-based company that operates globally and is known for hosting a wide array of casino games. What makes it stand is the fact that it has a very reliable customer support that promptly responds to any of their customer needs. Being a global company, international payment options such as Neteller and Skrill are readily accepted. Their simple interface is user-friendly and makes it easy for clients to navigate through the many pages.

Jackpot city

This is an online casino gaming company whose ratings have been increasing over time. They are famed for their diverse game types which include online slot games and top casino games such as blackjack, roulette among others. Apart from their welcome bonuses, their customer support agents work round the clock to ensure that customers get the ultimate experience.

It is worth noting that these Casino games we’re not randomly selected, but were rigorously vetted in order to shortlist the best ones. There are other interesting online casinos that did not make it to this list. Other worthy mentions include Ruby fortune, Sloty Casino and Vegas Hero Casino.
